name: Empanadas
description: Argentina is world-famous for its beef. Enjoy an Argentine classic with these juicy and crispy fried beef empanadas.

name: Choripán
description: The choripán is a chorizo sandwich often found as a street food or appetizer in Argentina, particularly for sporting events.

name: Fugazzeta de Verdura
description: Fugazzeta is a double-crusted version of fugazza, stuffed with cheese, and topped with the same sweet onions. Fugazzeta de verdura has all of this plus a layer of sautéed spinach and vegetables.

name: Tortilla de Guisantes con Jamón
description: This delicious Spanish tortilla with ham and peas makes the perfect breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
